metadata.title: CVE-2021-3713 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write flaw was found in the UAS (USB Attached SCSI) deviceemulation of QEMU in versions prior to 6.2.0-rc0. The device uses the guestsupplied stream number unchecked, which can lead to out-of-bounds access tothe UASDevice->data3 and UASDevice->status3 fields. A malicious guest usercould use this flaw to crash QEMU or potentially achieve code executionwith the privileges of the QEMU process on the host.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
